radiographic_examinations.findings: Bowel wall thickening with surrounding stranding at the sigmoid colon and a 4.4 x 4.7 x 4.1 cm complex fluid collection extending inferior from the inflammation, compatible with abscess formation. A few scattered diverticula are seen proximal to the region of inflammation. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Visualized lung fields, liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenals, kidneys, stomach, small bowel, urinary bladder, and reproductive organs are unremarkable.
